reviews.review: Прекрасная игра для тебя и твоего друга ! Сколько нервов и слёз (от смеха) были убиты и пролиты пока мы с другом проходили кооперативный режим. Сюжет мне понравился. Есть баги. Юмора море. Мне очень понравилась. Но за 37 часов проведённых в ней мне стало скучно. И я забил на неё. Так что это вам решать, покупать её или нет. Но лучше играть в неё с друзьями. Самому будет скучно, а если проходить совместные испытания с рандомами то вы можете просто испортить себе настроение. Игру я советую вам купить для игры с друзьями. 8/10
This is a fun puzzle game.

Un juegazo que debes jugarlo si o si. Se trata de un juego de puzzles en primera persona. Se puede jugar en un jugador o en modo coperativo online con un amigo o un jugador al azar, en el caso de jugarlo con un amigo te lo pasas mucho mejor. La dificultad de los niveles no son nada dificiles. Ademas incluye un editor de niveles en el cual puedes hacer tus propias salas para que los demas jugadores prueben tu nivel. 
Ojala saquen una tercera entrega de esta gran obra de arte :)

This game is by far an all time great. This game is truly spectacular. The levels were intriguing, the plot was great, and overall the experience was unparalleled. You can sit and ponder the same puzzle for an hour or more and then finally deduce the one piece you were missing the whole time, making for numerous "Aha!" moments, which is an excellent feeling for a puzzle game. The puzzles in this game are HARD, sometimes- but this is a good thing! I would rather be challenged than have a pushover game, it feels much more rewarding this way. And, the game has a great co-op to boot! Overall, this game is unforgettable and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a laugh and a challenge at the same time.

what do you expect from a sequel to portal? of course it's great.

Old and certainly gold but what an amazing sequel it is. Even being this old I can hands down say it's one of the best games out there. The storytelling, concept, voice acting and just general feel is spectacular and really well put together. I know there is a trope that says that Valve™ can't make a third game which is a fun joke considering what they've put out throughout the years. But if it were one game I wish had a third part, it is definitely portal.

Hey, I know puzzle games are not for everyone but this is no ordinary puzzle game and it really makes you think about the world differently compared to many games. The portal bundle comes once or twice a year which is both games for less than 2€ and I can fully say that's worth it, I even feel like full price is worth it which is why I bought it without the sale.

I don't really know what I can add to this as the game is simply a masterpiece, and with the co-op chambers you can have fun and solve stuff together and really just have a blast jumping through wormholes. Easily 10/10 score for this one.
